## nacos-cli

A CLI tool for Nacos

### Synopsis

A CLI tool for Nacos

```
nacos-cli [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.nacos.toml)
  -h, --help            help for nacos-cli
      --verbose         verbose output
```
